description: Data was extracted from GDC on January 2017 for DNA Methylation for chromosome 15 was generated using Illumina Human Methylation 27k and 450k platforms.

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-DX-A8BN
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: Unique ID for the array probe associated with a CpG site
fields.name: probe_id

fields.description: Represents the ratio between the methylated array intensity and total array intensity, falls between 0 (lower levels of methylation) and 1 (higher levels of methylation)
fields.name: beta_value

fields.description: Platform used to generate this data -- either HumanMethylation450 or HumanMethylation27
fields.name: platform

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode)  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba25
fields.name: file_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this case (corresponds to the case_barcode).  Can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this:   https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba18
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this aliquot (corresponds to the aliquot_barcode), eg 7fbfdb3e-1fd2-4206-8d2e-7f68e4a15844  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: aliquot_gdc_id
